Package com.att.research.xacml.std.dom

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DOMAdvice
    DOMAdvice provides a static method for creating an instance of the com.att.research.xacml.Advice interface from a Node representing a XACML 3.0 Advice element, and for creating a List of Advice objects from a Node representing a XACML 3.0 AssociatedAdvice element.
    DOMAttribute
    DOMAttribute extends StdMutableAttribute with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMAttributeAssignment  
    DOMAttributeCategory
    DOMAttributeCategory extends StdAttributeCategory with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMAttributeValue<T>
    DOMAttributeValue extends StdAttributeValue with methods for creation from DOM elements.
    DOMDocumentRepair
    DOMDocumentRepair provides methods for examining a DOM Document for XACML document types and doing repair on them.
    DOMIdReference
    DOMIdReference extends StdIdReference with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMIdReferenceMatch
    DOMIdReferenceMatch extends StdIdReferenceMatch with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMMissingAttributeDetail
    DOMMissingAttributeDetail extends StdMutableMissingAttributeDetail with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMObligation
    Provides static methods for creating Obligation objects from a Node.
    DOMProperties
    DOMProperties contains utilities for determining the properties for parsing XACML documents with a DOM parser.
    DOMRequest
    DOMRequest is used to convert XML into Request objects.
    DOMRequestAttributes
    DOMRequestAttributes extends StdRequestAttributes with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMRequestAttributesReference
    DOMRequestAttributesReference extends StdRequestAttributesReference with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMRequestDefaults
    DOMRequestDefaults extends StdRequestDefaults with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMRequestReference
    DOMRequestReference extends StdMutableRequestReference with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMResponse
    DOMResponse is used to convert XML into Response objects and Response objects into XML strings.
    DOMResult
    DOMResult extends StdMutableResult with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMStatus
    DOMStatus extends StdMutableStatus with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMStatusCode
    DOMStatusCode extends com.att.research.xacml.comomon.std.StdStatusCode with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    DOMStatusDetail
    DOMStatusDetail extends StdMutableStatusDetail with methods for construction from DOM Nodes.
    DOMUtil
    DOMUtil contains a number of utility functions for DOM document elements.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DOMDocumentRepair.UnsupportedDocumentTypeException  
    DOMStructureException
